lines.lyrics: Nightmare,

lines.chord: Em D            G        C                Em D Bm
lines.lyrics: I  saw you standing, you were right there
And I surrender,

lines.chord: Em   D            G     C        Em D Bm
lines.lyrics: Your face is just how I remember
To think about it now, think about it now
You threw me overboard, no hesitation
And now you're tryin' to figure out, tryin' to figure out
How to come back looking like a  savior
And I,
I'm gonna be just fine
Oh I don't need your lifeline
I,
I'm gonna be just fine
Oh I don't need your lifeline

lines.chord: C                    Em    D                     G    C   Em D Bm
lines.lyrics: Tell me one more time  how you're the one to save  it all
I'll tell you one more time  how you're the one that made  me fall

lines.chord: Em   D            Bm            C Em D G
lines.lyrics: Oh I don't need your lifeline
Flashback,

lines.chord: Em D                  G        C               Em D Bm
lines.lyrics: Oh how I used to wish that you would come back
But now I'm past hurt,

lines.chord: Em      D                        G      C            Em D Bm
lines.lyrics: So it's strange to see you crawl out of the woodwork
To think about it now, think about it now
You threw me overboard, no hesitation
And now you're tryin' to figure out, tryin' to figure out
How to come back looking like a  savior
And I,
I'm gonna be just fine
Oh I don't need your lifeline
I,
I'm gonna be just fine
Oh I don't need your lifeline

lines.chord: C                    Em    D                     G    C   Em D Bm
lines.lyrics: Tell me one more time  how you're the one to save  it all
I'll tell you one more time  how you're the one that made  me fall
Oh I don't need your lifeline

lines.chord: Am7  Am9     Am7  Am9     G    G5   Dsus4  D

lines.lyrics: And now you cast your  rope
Like it's some kind of joke
Like you forgot what  happened here
Why do you just show  up
When you're down on your luck
And when you've got no  ship to steer
And I,
I'm gonna be just fine
Oh I don't need your lifeline
I,
I'm gonna be just fine
Oh I don't need your lifeline
